name: Mary's Sugar Cookies
author: Pat
summary: A very good sugar cookie with a hint of almond flavor.
ingredients: ¼ cup granulated sugar for decoration
directions: In a large bowl, cream together the butter and confectioners' sugar until smooth
Beat in the egg and stir in the vanilla and almond extract
Combine the flour, baking soda and cream of tartar; blend into the creamed mixture
Cover and chill for at least two hours
Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)
Divide the dough into two parts
On a lightly floured surface, roll each piece of the dough out to 3/16 inch in thickness
Cut into desired shapes with cookie cutters
Place cookies 1 1/2 inches apart onto greased cookie sheets
Sprinkle cookies with plain or colored granulated sugar
Bake for 8 minutes in the preheated oven, until lightly browned
Allow cookies to cool on baking sheet for 5 minutes before removing to a wire rack to cool completely
